title: Washington, D.C. prepares for Trump inauguration
shortDescription: Washington, D.C. prepares as President-elect Donald Trump and Vice President-elect Sen. JD Vance (R-OH) will be sworn in on January 20.

title: Donald Trump says he'll issue executive order to delay TikTok ban
shortDescription: The president-elect Sunday pledged an executive order, hours into his second term, returning access for American users, at least temporarily.

title: Joe Biden pardons five people, including late civil rights leader Marcus Garvey
shortDescription: President Joe Biden pardoned five people on Sunday, including the late civil rights leader Marcus Garvey, and commuted the sentences of two.

title: Who is Kai Trump? What to know about the president's eldest grandchild
shortDescription: Donald Trump has five children and 10 grandchildren. Here's what to know about his eldest grandchild and avid golfer Kai Trump.

title: Trump plans 100 immediate executive actions: 'Shock and awe'
shortDescription: Donald Trump intends to start his second White House term by unleashing more than 100 executive orders and directives.

title: Trump poised for disruptive second term as Inauguration Day arrives
shortDescription: Trump 2.0 looks a lot like Trump 1.0 − unpredictable, tumultuous and with GOP infighting. It's also promising big changes that many voters wanted.

title: Who is Eric Trump? What to know about Trump's son
shortDescription: Eric Trump, 41, is the third child of Donald and the late Ivana Trump. Here's what to know about him as his dad returns to the White House.

title: Who is Ivanka Trump? What to know about the president's eldest daughter
shortDescription: Donald Trump's family members including his eldest daughter, Ivanka Trump and her husband Jared Kushner are expected to attend the inauguration.

title: Donald and Melania Trump's 20th anniversary: Archive photos of 2005 wedding
shortDescription: President-elect Donald Trump's inauguration and his 20th anniversary are the same week. Palm Beach Post photos offer a glimpse into the 2005 wedding.

title: Column: MLK's son has a message for Donald Trump – and for America
shortDescription: Suzette Hackney talked with Martin Luther King III about the convergence of Inauguration Day with the day of service that honors his father.

title: Who is Barron Trump? What to know about the president's youngest son
shortDescription: Donald Trump's family members including his youngest son, Barron Trump, are expected to attend the inauguration. What to know about Barron Trump.

title: Trump wants to deport immigrant 'criminals.' Can they be tracked down?
shortDescription: Immigration and Customs Enforcement has 6,000 deportation agents and more than 660,000 on its arrest docket.

title: 'Hookwinked'? Democrats weigh resisting, cooperating with Trump 2.0.
shortDescription: As Democrats and progressives reach the acceptance phase of their grief, there is less uniformity in cooperating with the next Trump administration.

title: Could JD Vance help shape Trump's economic policies?
shortDescription: Vance has never been a darling of the traditional free-market conservatives that dominate the Republican Vance party. Can he shape Trump’s policy?

title: Three Israeli hostages released by Hamas as ceasefire in war in Gaza begins
shortDescription: A truce in the brutal war that began with the Oct. 7, 2023, Hamas attacks trades 3 Israeli hostages for 100 Palestinian prisoners. No American is on the list.

title: German ambassador warns of Trump plan to redefine constitutional order
shortDescription: Germany's ambassador to the U.S. warns the incoming Trump administration will give big tech companies "co-governing power."

title: Trump wants to visit China as president: WSJ
shortDescription: Trump has expressed interest in traveling to China in his first 100 days in office according to the Wall Street Journal.

title: Where is Trump? Incoming president and family flies to Washington, DC
shortDescription: President Biden sends a military plane to bring Trump and family to DC on Saturday ahead of Inauguration Day.

title: Trump will likely visit California next week after his inauguration
shortDescription: Donald Trump told NBC News that he will likely travel to California next week after his inauguration to view the devastation caused by the wildfires.

title: Foreign leaders attending Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Foreign leaders and CEOs are the invited guests of President-elect Donald Trump at his second inauguration.

title: Nelly to perform at Liberty Ball for Trump on Inauguration Day
shortDescription: American rapper and three-time Grammy award-winning artist Nelly will perform at the Liberty Ball on Inauguration Day.

title: Brazil court rejects Bolsonaro's bid to attend Trump's inauguration
shortDescription: Bolsonaro's lawyers filed an appeal claiming the politician had fully complied with the precautionary measures imposed on him by the Supreme Court.

title: Trump: TikTok 'likely' to get 90-day 'reprieve' from ban: NBC News
shortDescription: Trump give a wide-ranging interview with NBC News including that he'll "most likely" give TikTok a 90-day reprieve from the ban once he takes office.

title: A look at Donald Trump's life and family before he takes office
shortDescription: Learn more about president-elect Donald Trump's life, children, and siblings before he takes office Monday.

title: What to know about Trump's 'victory rally' in DC before inauguration
shortDescription: On Sunday, President-elect Donald Trump is set to hold a 'victory rally' in Washington D.C., one day before his inauguration. Here's what to know.
